column5: Glass mat and cloth is the way to repair but more details are needed about this soft spot.  For carpet, headliners etc I use permatex spray adhesive.
i have used 3m 88 spray glue i bought it at home depot

Soft spot in floor is not good, might be water intrusion-rotted stringers or cross members. If your going to glass over it I'd use idiot saw first and have a look.  Adhesive remover works great for cleaning glue without reacting with floor.
Your already at it, you may as well change the floor too, it will need to be changed eventually, and then you will also have to probably change your carpet again too.
